Comments_List: Learnt about arguments on capitalism. Rousseau was the most useful.
It could be improved by more deeper insights and getting into philosophic debates instead of superficially touching many things.
A really interesting course. Professor Mantena is very insightful and knows what questions to ask. She is also very reasonable about deadlines.
